parameters.name: ContainerGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the elastic container instances. You can specify up to 20 IDs. Each ID must be a JSON string.

parameters.name: EventSource
parameters.description:
The event source. Valid values:

*   EciService
*   K8sAgent

This parameter is empty by default. This indicates that all events are queried.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of elastic container instances to be returned for this request. Default value: 200.

>  The number of elastic container instances to be returned is no greater than this parameter value.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SinceSecond
parameters.description: A relative time in seconds before the current time from which to show event information. This parameter is used to poll incremental events.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag that is added to the elastic container instances.
